text: tum usase ek baar kaho to
us ekaant jeevan mein siva vinod ke aur kya avalamb tha
ramesh to munh dho daalo barag rakhee huee hai
rama ne use nikaalakar dekha aur hansakar bola eeshvar ne tumhaaree sun lee cheej to bahut achchhee maaloom hotee hai
maan vah to bahut roopayon mein banega betee
thaanedaar na the par thaanedaaree karate the
bandha hua ghodaathaan se khul gaya use kaun rok sakata hai
ramaanaath haan jaata hoon magar unase to main bees hee batalaoonga
use chhodate hue kyon na duhkh hota
rama phir let gaya aur ramesh ne bhojan kiya kapade pahane aur daphtar chalane ko taiyaar hue

dayaanaath ne chidhakar kaha tum to jale par namak chhidakatee ho bura maaloom hota hai to lao ek hajaar nikaalakar de do mahaajan ko de aaoon detee ho bura mujhe khud maaloom hota hai lekin upaay kya hai gala kaise chhootega
apanee baat yaad karo
jaageshvaree ne apane paksh ka samarthan hote dekh khush hokar kaha yahee to main inase kah rahee hoon
jaalapa ka bhagn hraday shahajaadee kee in baaton se maano jee utha vah roondhe kanth se bolee yahee to main bhee sochatee hoon bahan jab aaj na mila to phir kya milega
dayaanaath ne poochha kaise
usane socha main kitana bada kaayar hoon
choree ka shabd zabaan par laate hue rama ka hraday dhadak utha
ek baar ghar kee yaad aa gaee rone lagee
tab nishchint hokar baithen
aur sab gahanon ke naam kaan mein aate the chandrahaar ka naam na aata tha
agar pachaassaath roopaye maheene bhee bach jaayan to paanch saal mein jaalapa gahanon se lad jaegee
saalbhar bhee na beetane paaya tha ki naukar ho gae
stree ka saprem aagrah puroosh se kya nahin kara sakata
asalee haar kee abhilaasha abhee usake man mein uday hee nahin huee thee
ramaanaath usee tarah jaise aapake aur bhaee karate hain
jo bade baaboo pahale the vah pachees roopaye maheena lete the magar yah kuchh nahin lete
chaarj de diya
amma to jaanatee hain ki chadhaave mein chandrahaar na jaane se use kitana bura laga tha
tum nahin gaee badee galatee kee
ramaanaath kuchh poochhie mat tabhee se daanapaanee chhod rakha hai main to tang aa gaya
chaarj dekar jab vah vida hone lage to rama unake saath jeene ke neeche tak gaya
isalie ab is gutthee ke sulajhaane ka bhaar unheen donon par tha
main chidiya nahin hoon jisaka pinjadaadaanapaanee rakhakar band kar diya jaay
usee surakshit gadhee mein pahunchakar ghar kee chintaon aur baadhaon se unakee jaan bachatee thee
use pahanakar vah saare gaanv mein naachatee giree
aisee unhen koee misaal na milatee thee jisane rishvat lekar chain kiya ho unakee yah drdh dhaarana ho gaee thee ki haraam kee kamaee haraam hee mein jaatee hai
chhoteebadee sabon ne aakar use gher liya
rama ne lota rakh diya aur usakee or is tarah taakane laga maano usakee baat samajh mein na aaee ho
bola priye tumhaara khyaal bahut theek hai
ramaanaath to kya tum sachamuch jaogee tab mujhe naukaree mil chukee aur main khat likh chuka is viyog ke duhkh mein baithakar rooonga ki naukaree dhoondhooga
us vakt daya na aaee thee jab main unake ghar se vida huee thee
haan zara samajhboojhakar kaam karane kee jaroorat hai
jaalapa meree ichchha
aaj nahin to kal saara haal maaloom hee ho jaega
ramaanaath aapako to beesbaees saal naukaree karate ho gae honge
maaloom hua ki chadhaava aa raha hai

phir teen maheene par aae magar sarraaph bhee ek hee ghuta hua aadamee tha usee vakt tala jab dayaanaath ne teesare din baakee rakam kee cheejen lauta dene ka vaada kiya aur yah bhee usakee sajjanata hee thee
shaadee ke saataven din use ek hajaar roopaye dene ka vaada tha
koee aisa mitr na tha jisase usane badhbadhakar baaten na kee hon
jaalapa apane kamare mein jaakar bistar lapetane lagee ki rama ne usaka haath pakad liya aur bola tumhen meree kasam jo is vakt jaane ka naam lo
ab batalaie hai kaheen naukareechaakaree ka sahaara
yah chandrahaar ke lie itanee vikal ho rahee hai
jaageshvaree maranajeena to sansaar kee gati hai lete hain vah bhee marate hain nahin lete vah bhee marate hain
rosh ka ek kaaran yah bhee tha ki use akelee chhodakar saara ghar utsav dekhane chala gaya
rama ne adhik aagrah na kiya
main ammaajee ko yah dikhaana chaahatee hoon ki jaalapa tumhaare gahanon kee bhookhee nahin hai
na kaheen aana na jaana na kisee se baat na cheet aise koee kitane din rah sakata hai mujhe in logon se ab koee aasha nahin rahee
jo auraten gahane nahin pahanateen kya unake din nahin katate
tum gae aur main aaee
ramesh baaboo ko yah vishvaas ho raha tha ki aaj mera sitaara buland hai
ramesh aur jo kaheen saahab ne bulaaya to main hee chala jaoonga
vahaan se saas aur bahoo ko bulaava aaya
tumhen kya tum to saheliyon ke saath vihaar karogee meree khabar tak na logee aur yahaan meree jaan par ban aavegee
un logon kee bhee khaatir ho jaegee
dvaarachaar ke baad baraat janavaase chalee gaee
inhen maangana padega
is ghar mein phir kaise kadam rakha jaayaga
pahale usake teen bhaee aur the par is samay vah akelee thee
rama ne koee javaab na diya
tum zara bhee dheelee padeen aur kaam bigada
ramaanaath zara bhee jee nahin chaahata main jaanata ki sir mudaate hee ole padenge to main vivaah ke nazadeek hee na jaata
streepuroosh boodhejavaan sab chadhaava dekhane ke lie utsuk ho uthe

roopaye rakhate hue koee apane priyajanon ka kasht nahin dekh sakata ye log kya mere aansoo na ponchh sakate the main din ke din yahaan padee rahatee hoon koee jhoothon bhee poochhata hai muhalle kee striyaan milane aatee hain kaise miloon yah soorat to mujhase nahin dikhaee jaatee
ramaanaath ne ek lambee saans kheenchee
deenadayaal ke saath hee unaka yah salook na tha yah unaka svabhaav tha
dayaanaath ne poochha koee baat soojhee mujhe to kuchh nahin soojhata
rama ne bade anuraag se use phoolon ke gahane pahanaane shuroo kie phoolon ke sheetal komal sparsh se jaalapa ke komal shareer mein gudagudeesee hone lagee
main sab theek kar doonga
abhee unake odhanepahanane ke din hain
phir bhee chandrahaar kee kasar rah gaee
usaka koee kamara alag to tha nahin ek hee mardaana kamara tha isee mein dayaanaath apane doston se gapshap karate donon ladake padhate aur rama mitron ke saath shataranj khelata
miyaan ne to usee jagah par rahate hue ladakon ko eme elelbee kara liya
ramesh dekho bhaee beeemaanee mat karo
usane apana haath chhuda liya aur phir bichhaavan lapetane lagee
maaloom hota hai nasnas mein sharaaphat bharee huee hai
dayaanaath badasa munh kholate hajaaron kee baatacheet karate to deenadayaal unhen aisa chakama dete ki vah umrbhar yaad karate
rama ne bibhadakar kaha naahak jaga diya kaisee maje qee neend aa rahee thee
baraat mein har ek rasm danke kee chot par ada hotee hai
isee samay ek bisaatee aakar jhoole ke paas khada ho gaya
das roopaye par naukar hua tha
aur kaun aisa nithalla tha jo raatraat bhar unase shataranj khelata
teenon kautoohal se usakee or taakane lageen maano usaka aashay unakee samajh mein na aaya ho baasantee ne kaha jee chaahata hai kaareegar ke haath choom loon
chain se khaate aur mauj udaate the nahin to baithebaithae is maayaajaal mein phanse
is rtu mein mahilaon kee baalsmrtiyaan bhee jaag uthatee hain
unhen maaloom ho jaay ki bina chandrahaar banavae kushal nahin
bahoo aaee hai usaka munh dekhega usase premaalaap karega ki is boodhe ke saath shataranj khelega kaee baar jee mein aaya use bulavaen par yah sochakar ki vah kyon aane laga rah gae
ramaanaath bhala is tarah jaogee to tumhaare gharavaale kya kahenge kuchh yah bhee to socho
teesare din rama kotpaint pahanakar aur hait lagaakar nikala to usakee shaan hee kuchh aur ho gaee
mere man mein tarahtarah ke chitr aate the
mujhe kisee ka dar nahin hai
jaakar kah aao
sachche nageene hain
jaalapa jab tumhaaree naukaree kaheen lag jaay to mujhe bula lena
vivaah mein paanch hajaar se kam ka chadhaava nahin gaya tha magar paanch hee saal mein sab svaaha ho gaya
tumhaare siva aur kaun baitha hua hai jisake lie yahaan padasada karoon
mere hraday mein kaantasa khatakata rahega
vah unmaad kee see dasha mein apane kamare mein aaee aur phootphootakar rone lagee
saare din anaathon kee tarah padee rahatee hoon
yah kahaan kee neeti hai ki hamaare oopar sankat pada hua ho aur ham apane niyamon ka raag alaape jaen
mujhamen samaee nahin hai
kya main baaboojee ko saaphsaaph javaab na de sakata tha mainne haamee hee kyon bharee kya jaalapa se ghar kee dasha saaphsaaph kah dena mera kartavy na tha usakee aankhen bhar aaee
yahaan bachchon ko bhee doodh mayassar na tha
naach theek kiya to avval darje ka baajegaaje bhee avval darje ke doyam ya soyam ka vahaan jikr hee na tha
rama ne muskaraakar kaha kuchh upahaar
ramesh baaboo kee jeet rahee
ek baniya jo do ghante se khada tha khush hokar bola haan sarakaar yah bahut achchha hoga
sahasa ramaanaath tenisraiket liye baahar se aaya
ramesh bahut achchha hua thaane mein rapat nahin likhaee nahin saudo sau ke matthe aur jaate
jaalapa ne usake lie kisee bade pad kee kalpana kar rakhee thee
main zara unake maatrsneh kee pareeksha lena chaahatee hoon
ramaanaath ne javaanon ke svabhaav ke anusaar jaalapa se khoob jeebh udaee thee
dhoomadhaam se vivaah karane kee than gaee
vaah kya kaareegaree hai jaalapa ke lie in cheejon mein leshamaatr bhee aakarshan na tha
saaree sajaavat saaree daudadhoop aur taiyaaree ka nibataara paanch minaton mein ho jaata hai
munh par harsh kee laalima chha gaee
jaalapa kee anupam chhavi ne pahale hee din us par mohinee daal dee thee
is shaadee mein unhonne miyaan kee jootee miyaan kee chaand vaalee neeti nibhaane kee thaanee thee par deenadayaal kee sahradayata ne unaka sanyam tod diya
ghaanee saadiyon ne prakrti kee hariyaalee se naata joda hai
ramaanaath to main aisee naukaree se baaz aaya
aur koee raah nahin
raaste mein ramesh ne muskaraakar kaha ghar kya bahaana karoge kuchh soch rakha hai
rama bhee vahaan se utha par jaalapa ke paas na jaakar apane kamare mein gaya
aur yah usee ka phal tha ki itane mitron ke hote hue bhee vah bekaar tha
umr to chaalees ke oopar thee par the bade rasik
tumhaare teemataam ke lie itana bahut hai
boodhe miyaan ne hansakar kaha abhee ganda maaloom hota hai lekin phir isee mein maza aaega
jhoothe nageenon mein yah aab kahaan
rama ke jee mein aaya ki saaph kah doon apana upadesh aap apane hee lie rakhie yah mere anukool nahin hai
rama ne rosh ke saath kaha agar aap chupachaap khelate hain to khelie nahin main jaata hoon
dayaanaath kamsekam ek hajaar to vahaan mil hee jaenge
pranay ke us nirmal prakaash mein usaka manovikaar kisee bhanyakar jantu kee bhaanti ghoorata hua jaan padata tha
shahajaadee to khidakee ke saamane se hatatee hee na thee
shataranj khelane baith jaate to savera kar dete
jab tak kangan na ban gae main neend bhar soee nahin
haar le liya gaya
bolee chaalees mein kya hoga bhala saathsabhaar to hote
dayaanaath ne apana phaisala suna diya
maanakee ko yah saake bahut dinon se thee
ladakiyon kee shaadiyaan achchhe gharon mein keen
cheej to yah gulooband hai kitane khoobasoorat phool hain aur unake beech ke heere kaise chamak rahe hain kisee bangaalee sunaar ne banaaya hoga
main apane aakhiree din jel mein nahin kaat sakata isamen sharm kee kya baat hai meree samajh mein nahin aata
aamon ke baag mein jhoola pada hua hai
kamsekam unase poochh to lena hee chaahie
nikammon ko raah par laane ka isase badhakar aur koee upaay hee nahin
ek din deenadayaal laute to maanakee ke lie ek chandrahaar lae
log shauk se dete hain
donon ne bhojan kiya aur phir shataranj par baithe pahalee baazee mein gyaarah baj gae
ramaanaath makkheechoos na hote to itanee sampatti kahaan se aatee
mujhe to yahee soojhata hai yah saaree sthiti use samajha dee jaay
aatishabaajiyaan banavaee to avval darje kee
bangaalee sunaar bechaare unakee kya baraabaree karenge
ramesh paanch nahin tum das khelo jee
shahajaadee ek baar kahakar dekho to ab unake kaun pahananeodhane ke din baithe hain
usase sugandh ud rahee thee
yaad hai
shahar mein vah teesare darje mein aata gaanv mein avval darje mein aaya
dene vaale ka hraday dekhana chaahie
tees kee naukaree bataana apamaan kee baat thee
main yah nahin dikhaana chaahata ki ham itane phatehaal hain
jaalapa mujhase to na kaha jaayaga
barason mein kaheen yah haar banane kee naubat aaee jeevan mein phir kabhee itane roopaye aayenge isamen unhen sandeh tha
ramaanaath ne koee javaab na diya
kab la deejiega
rama ko badeebadee baaten karane ka phir avasar mila
bahoo ko to bada duhkh hua hoga
jaalapa baat kuchh nahin huee apana jee hai
magar itana behaya na tha
boodhe munsheejee ne yadyapi khud hee yah jagah chhodee thee par is vakt jaate hue unhen duhkh ho raha tha
gaanv par unheen kee dhaak thee
koee yahaan kyon aane laga
varana main un cheezon ko kabhee na le jaane deta
na aage naath na peechhe pagaha
maal kee taul aur parakh mein drdhata se niyamon ka paalan karake vah dhan aur keerti donon hee kama sakata hai
usakee chhaatee dhakdhak kar rahee thee
maan ne muskaraakar kaha tere lie teree sasuraal se aaega
ghar pahunchakar usane kapade bhee na utaare lathapath jaalapa ke kamare mein pahunch gaya
koee baat dhyaan mein aate hee bhool jaatee aur bahut yaad karane par bhee yaad na aatee thee
baraat ka naatak us vakt paas hota hai jab raah chalate aadamee use pansad kar lete hain
in teen maheenon mein usane rama se ek baar bhee aabhooshan kee charcha na kee par usaka yah ekaantprem usake aacharan se uttejak tha
teeke mein ek hajaar denge to kya dvaar par ek hajaar bhee na denge vahee roopaye sarraaph ko de dena
yah roopaya lo
koee pandrah minat mein rama ye donon cheezen le jaalapa ke kamare kee or chala
jaalapa nahinnahin tumhaare haath jodatee hoon
us phatee huee daree par baithana rama ko apamaanajanak jaan pada
itane roopaye jama kar lena deenadayaal ke lie aasaan na tha
daphtar bhee bhool jaate
aur vah din bhee aa gaya jab usakee chirasanchit abhilaasha pooree hogee
ramesh niyamaanusaar paanch baje uth baithe snaan kiya sandhya kee ghoomane gae aur aath baje laute magar rama tab tak sota hee raha
eemaanadaaree se kaam karoge to kisee achchhe pad par pahunch jaoge
ramaanaath buree tarah phansa tha
ramesh ne hansakar kaha baraphee khaane ke baad gud khaane ko kisaka jee chaahata hai mahal ka sukh bhogane ke baad jhompada kise achchha lagata hai prem aatma ko trpt kar deta hai
ve jo kaam karate dil khol kar
aaj tum baazaar kee taraph gae the ki nahin
jaageshvaree ne anumodan kiya mujhase to nahin dekha jaata tha ki apana aadamee chinta mein pada rahe main gahane pahane baithee rahoon
jeth kee sunaharee chaandanee mein saamane phaile hue nagar ke kalash gumbad aur vrksh svapnchitron se lagate the
ramaanaath oh kya galatee huee
ramaanaath to aapane yahee kab kaha tha ki ham udhaar gahane lae hain aur dochaar din mein lauta denge aakhir yah saara svaang apanee dhaak baithaane ke lie hee kiya tha ya kuchh aur
badebade mahaajanon se rakamen milengee aur vah khushee se gale lagaayenge

dharmaatma banane ka kuchh phal milana chaahie ya nahin tumhaare hee darje par satyadev hain pakka makaan khadaakar diya jameendaaree khareed lee betee ke byaah mein kuchh nahin to paanch hazaar to kharch kie hee honge
jaalapa abhee ammaajee se to nahin kaha
khud chaahe dinabhar sairsapaate kiya kare magar kya majaal ki bhaee kaheen ghoomane nikal jaen
yah leejie shah to tum kal arjee de do
maanakee pyaas se behaal ho rahee thee kanth sookha jaata tha chadhaava aate hee pyaas bhaag gaee
pahale jode gahane ko unhonne gaun samajh rakha tha ab vahee sabase mukhy ho gaya
koee teen hajaar ka saamaan banava daala
main sabase pahale chandrahaar banavaoongee
ramesh mujhe gaaliyaan dilaoge aur kya phir kabhee na aane paoge
yah unaka nity ka niyam tha
jameendaaree hai usase kaee hajaar ka napha hai
raadha aur to sab kuchh hai keval chandrahaar nahin hai
shahajaadee uthee par jaalapa raasta rokakar khadee ho gaee aur bolee nahin abhee baitho bahan tumhaare pairon padatee hoon
us aavesh mein rama ne unhen khoob khareekharee sunaee aur vah chupachaap sunate rahe
yah aan tootee phir koee baat bhee na poochhega
ek hee kshan mein saheliyon kee yaad aa gaee hansane lagee
gaban barasaat ke din haiain saavan ka maheena
kapade pahane aur jaana hee chaahate the ki rama ne kamare mein kadam rakha
baap ke shabdon se jaalapa ka man na bhara
aiseeaisee baaten soojh gaee jo khaan saahab ko khvaab mein bhee na soojhee theen
bas yahee samajh lo ki gharavaale chain na lene paen yah baat haradam unake dhyaan mein rahe
haan vah var ko ek aankh dekhana chaahatee thee vah bhee sabase chhipaakar par us bheedbhaad mein aisa avasar kahaan
ek badeebadee aankhon vaalee baalika ne vah cheej pasand kee jo un chamakatee huee cheejon mein sabase sundar thee
bahanoeejee se dochaar din roothe rahane se bhee bahut kuchh kaam nikal sakata hai
sun nahin rahee ho main bhee vish kee gaanth hoon
ramaanaath aap de deejiega
das baje sahasa phir baaje bajane lage
jaalapa ajee vahee jo rangroop mein sabase achchhee thee jisake gaal par ek til tha tumane usakee or bade prem se dekha tha bechaaree laaj ke maare gad gaee thee
rama ne doosare din naya soot banavaaya aur phaishan kee kitanee hee cheezen khareedeen
jaalapa magar hain makkheechoos palle sire ke
jab dil par jabr karake duniya kee laaj se ya kisee ke dhikkaarane se diya to kya diya
jaalapa shahar aur dehaat ka phark kya jaane shahar mein rahane ka use kabhee avasar hee na pada tha
jaalapa khil uthee
baasantee ne shahajaadee ka haath pakadakar kaha ab uthegee bhee ki yahaan saaree raat upadesh hee detee rahegee
vaah kabhee dekha bhee hai solah tole se kam nikal jae to munh na dikhaoon
dayaanaathaka jee to laharaaya ki lage haath use bhee le lo kisee ko naak sikodane kee jagah to na rahegee par jaageshvaree is par raajee na huee
lekin ramaanaath mein itanee lagan na thee
ramaanaath vetan to tees hai
jis din meree peshee hone vaalee thee aisa ghabaraaya hua tha maano phaansee paane ja raha hoon magar tumhen darane ka koee kaaran nahin hai
sasuraal se chandrahaar aaega vahaan ke log use maatapita se adhik pyaar karenge tabhee to jo cheej ye log nahin banava sakate vah vahaan se aaegee
tumhaare ghar kahalae deta hoon ki aaj yaheen soenge intazaar na karen
jaalapa paan to khaate jao
jab vah usase kahegee tumhaaree jameendaaree kya huee baink ke roopaye kya hue to use kya javaab dega virakt bhaav se bola isamen beijjatee ke siva aur kuchh na hoga
doolha kaleva karane aa raha hai baaje bajane lage
meree to raay hai kar lo
rama kamare mein pahuncha to donon ladake taash khel rahe the
ramaanaath oonh jo chaahe keejiega main to sota hoon
main unakee daya ke bina bhee jeetee rah sakatee hoon
kaheen usakee sasuraal se bhee na aaya to usane socha to kya maataajee apana haar mujhe de dengee avashy de dengee
ramaanaath ab to mujhe neend aa rahee hai
makaan ka haal dekh chuka
maan ne bisaatee se poochha baaba yah haar kitane ka hai bisaatee ne haar ko roomaal se ponchhate hue kaha khareed to bees aane kee hai maalakin jo chaahen de den
sinema se unhen bahut prem na tha par is vakt unhen sinema ke siva aur kuchh na soojha
ramesh ajee vah din gae jab aap mujhe maat diya karate the
rama kee aamadanee tezee se badhane lagee
shahajaadee sach kahatee thee mard bade tonahe hote hain
usakee peeth thonkakar bole kaayade ke andar raho aur jo chaaho karo
yadi dayaanaath kee ichchha na hotee to rama kya kar sakata tha jo kuchh hua unheen kee anumati se hua
phatehaal bhikhaaree ke lie chutakee bahut samajhee jaatee hai lekin gerooe resham dhaaran karane vaale baabaajee ko lajaatelajaate bhee ek roopaya dena hee padata hai
mere chadhaav par kangan nahin aaya tha us vakt man aisa khakra hua ki saare gahanon par laat maar doon
choree ho jaane par to sabr karana hee padega
khaanepahanane ke lie kaun karj leta hai
itane mein maanakee ne aakar kaha tum teenon yahaan baithee kya kar rahee ho chalo vahaan log khaana khaane aa rahe hain
dayaanaath ne maathe par haath rakh liya aur ek kshan ke baad aahat kanth se bole nahin main aisa na karane doonga

maatapita kee aankhen bachaakar vah jeene par jaana chaahata tha ki jaageshvaree ne toka inheen ke to sab kaante boe hue hain inase kyon nahin salaah lete rama se tumane naachtamaashe mein baarahterah sau roopaye uda die batalao sarraaph ko kya javaab diya jaay badee mushkilon se kuchh gahane lautaane par raajee hua magar bahoo se gahane maange kaun yah sab tumhaaree hee karatoot hai
aakhir jab saadhe nau baj gae to unhonne use jagaaya
koee aisa bhalaamaanus na dikhata tha jo kuchh bina kahe hee jaan jae aur use koee achchheesee jagah dila de
koee baajon kee dhondhonponpon sunakar mast ho raha tha koee motar ko aankhen gaadgaadakar dekh raha tha
kya bangaaliyon ne kaareegaree ka theka le liya hai hamaare desh mein ekseek kaareegar pade hue hain
saamane kamare mein laimp jal raha tha vah uthakar kamare mein gaee aur aaeene ke saamane khadee ho gaee
ladake achchhe kapadon ko tarasate stree gahanon ko tarasatee par dayaanaath vichalit na hote the
kuchh mitron se udhaar le lie

bole agar un gahanon ke badale mulamme ke gahane de die jaen magar turant hee unhen gyaat ho gaya ki yah lachar baat hai khud hee usaka virodh karate hue kaha haan baad mulamma ud jaayaga to phir lajjit hona padega
sastee cheejen utha lae jisamen roopaye kharch hote the usaka naam hee na liya
dayaanaath ne maatha sikodakar kaha usase parda rakhane kee jaroorat hee kya apanee yathaarth sthiti ko vah jitanee hee jaldee samajh le utana hee achchha
shahajaadee main kah doongee
haan makadoor chaahie so deenadayaal podhe aadamee hain
bhaagy mein jo likha tha vah hua
is drshti mein rosh ke siva aur koee bhaav nahin hai magar yah kuchh bolatee kyon nahin chup kyon ho gaee usaka chup ho jaana hee gajab tha
samadhee milane aa raha hai baaje bajane lage
rama ne ek minat mein munh dhoya paanch minat mein bhojan kiya aur chatapat ramesh ke saath daphtar chala
ramesh ne taak par se muhare aur bisaat utaarate hue kaha aao ek baajee ho jae phir is maamale ko sochen ise jitana aasaan samajh rahe ho utana aasaan nahin hai
in saare abhaavon kee poorti ke lie ramaanaath ke paas meetheemeethee badeebadee baaton ke siva aur kya tha
usane manheeman hisaab laga liya tha ki kitana maasik bachat ho jaane se vah jaalapa ke lie chandrahaar banava sakega
jaalapa ne apanee lambeelambee palaken uthaakar usakee or aise deennajar se dekha maano jeevan mein ab usake lie koee aasha nahin hai
eeshvar se manaatee thee ki kaheen se baat aae
kuchh bacha bhee leta hoon lekin jis ghar mein bahut se aadamee hon ladakon kee padhaee ho ladakiyon kee shaadiyaan hon vah aadamee kya kar sakata hai
kiya to mainne hee magar yah bala to kisee tarah sir se taalanee chaahie
ramaanaath ke kathan mein bahut kuchh saty tha
nahin to aaj mere paas bhee gahane na hote ekek karake sab nikal gae
shaayad isalie ki vah apanee aankhon se is tarah ke drshy dekh chuke the
vah harabhara lahalahaata hua paudha jal gaya keval usakee raakh rah gaee
raadha to kya tum jaanatee ho jaalapa ka chandrahaar na banega
dayaanaath ko ek upaay soojha
socha do hajaar seedhe hue jaate hain paanchsaat sau roopaye rah jaenge vah kahaan jaate hain
jab yahaan koee meree baat nahin poochhata to main bhee kisee ko apana nahin samajhatee
raadha aur baasantee dil mein kaamp rahee theen ki jaalapa kaheen taad na jaay
saare gahane sandook mein band kar rakhe hain
tum to mujhe jaanate ho ab to boodha ho gaya hoon lekin main tumase sach kahata hoon is vidhurjeevan mein mainne kisee stree kee or aankh tak nahin uthaee
kamare mein ek aale par shiv kee moorti rakhee huee thee
dochaar jhool raheen hain do chaar jhula rahee hain
vah saahabee thaath banaakar saare daphtar par rob jamaana chaahata tha
dochaar sakheesaheliyaan hain khetkhalihaan hain baagbageeche hain jee bahalata rahega
usane use uthaakar aisa pataka ki usakee aashaon kee bhaanti vah bhee choorchoor ho gaee
unakee vyaavahaarik buddhi mein yah vichaar hee na aata tha ki jaalapa kisee aur cheej se adhik prasann ho sakatee hai
jaalapa ne ek lambee saans lekar kaha kya kahoon bahan mujhe to aasha nahin hai
aatishabaajee hee manoranjan ka kendr thee
us niraasha ke aavesh mein usaka aisa jee chaahane laga ki apana munh noch daale
rama khisiyaanasa hokar ek kinaare khada ho gaya
pachaassaath roopaye oopar se mil jaenge
jaalapa ekaant mein is soocheepatr ko bade dhyaan se dekha karatee
udhar badanaamee huee idhar yah aaphat sir par aaee
dayaanaath kee sajjanata ne unhen vasheebhoot kar liya
shahajaadee meree baat chhodo mera khasam to meree baat hee nahin poochhata
dayaanaath ne sharamaakar kaha nahinnahin magar aakhir vahaan bhee to kuchh milega
mera jis vakt jee chaahega jaoongee jis vakt jee chaahega aaoongee
aajakal chandrama balavaan hain
ve saare teemataam naachtamaashe jinakee kalpana ka unhonne gala ghont diya tha vahee roop dhaaran karake unake saamane aa gae
ramaanaath achchha aaie aap bhee kya kahenge magar main paanch baaziyon se kam na kheloonga
ekaek use ek chaal soojhee
baraat aise dhoom se jaanee chaahie ki gaanvbhar mein shor mach jaay
vah kisaan na the par khetee karate the
saahab daantvaant to na bataenge
dayaanaath vah mujhase nahin ho sakata
ramesh ajee vah arjee dena hai ki nahin tumako
vah the jameendaar ke mukhtaar

kitanee neechata hai kitana kapat kitanee nirdayata apanee preyasee ke saath aisee dhoortata usake man ne use dhikkaara agar is vakt use koee ek hajaar roopaya de deta to vah usaka umrabhar ke lie gulaam ho jaata
raadha aur baasantee manheeman shahajaadee ko kos rahee theen aur thappad dikhadikhaakar dhamaka rahee theen par shahajaadee ko is vakt tamaashe ka maja aa raha tha
shataranj unake lie sharaab se kam maadak na tha
mujhase kahane lagee jeeja to bade rasik jaan padate hain
nahin to rama ko lagaataar teen maat dena aasaan na tha
jaroor yahee baat hai
yah kangan to dekho bilkul pakkee jadaee hai kitana baareek kaam hai ki aankh nahin thaharatee kaisa damak raha hai
samajh gae abhee naya josh hai naee sanak hai
apane man ka sanshay mitaane aur jaalapa ke man kee thaah lene ke lie rama ne maano dubbee maaree yah kaun jaanata tha ki dolee se utarate hee yah vipatti tumhaara svaagat karegee
main jise chaahoon dinabhar daphtar mein khada rakhoon mahaajanon ka ekek minat ekek asharaphee ke baraabar hai
ek kshan mein paarsal taiyaar ho gaya aur rama use liye hue chintit bhaav se neeche chala
tab se bechaare bahut sambhalakar chalate the

ramesh baaboojee ke paas kya kaee ka khajaana rakha hua hai abhee chaarpaanch hazaar kharch kie hain phir kahaan se laakar gahane banava den dasbees hazaar roopaye honge to abhee to bachche bhee to saamane hain aur naukaree ka bharosa hee kya pachaas roope hota hee kya hai
jaalapa isamen sharm kee kaunsee baat hai kahate sharm aatee ho to khat likh do
yahaan kaunsa sukh bhog rahee hoon
shataranj kee ek baajee bhee na huee
baakee saara kaam apane hee haathon karana padata tha
tum vichitr aadamee ho na khud maangoge na mujhe maangane doge to aakhir yah naav kaise chalegee main ek baar nahin hajaar baar kah chuka ki mujhase koee aasha mat rakho
ramesh ajee dochaar chaalen chalo to aapheeaap jee lag jaayaga
bujhatee huee aag mein tel pad gaya
shaayad apane gharavaalon ko bhee likh bheje
haan bahan sab saadh pooree ho gaee
jaalapa ne uchhalakar poochha sach kitane kee jagah hai
shahajaadee tum bhee to sasuraal se saalabhar baad aaee ho kaunkaunsee naee cheejen banava laee
khaakar tab baitho
teesaree baazee khatm huee to do baj gae
tab se ek chhalla banavaana bhee naseeb na hua
dayaanaath ne bhaunchakdh hokar kaha utha laoge usase chhipaakar
rama ne lota uthaaya hee tha ki jaalapa ne aakar ugr bhaav se kaha mujhe mere ghar pahuncha do isee vakt
kuchh javaab na diya
koee upaay sochana hee padega
main jaakar apane kapade baandhaatee hoon aur isee gaadee se jaoongee
jaakar chaar paise ka maajoon le lo daude hue aana
vah laalasa jo aaj saat varsh hue usake hraday mein ankurit huee thee jo is samay pushp aur pallav se ladee khadee thee us par vajrapaat ho gaya
bola haan yah tumane bahut achchhee tarakeeb batalaee kal jaroor likhoonga
magar jaalapa kee abhilaashaen abhee ek bhee pooree na huee
rama ne aroochi prakat karate hue kaha ganda kaam hai main sagaee se kaam karana chaahata hoon
ramaanaath us haaytoba se hamaaree kya haani ho sakatee thee
jab maaloom ho gaya chandrahaar nahin hai to usake kaleje par chotsee lag gaee
rama ne chatapat kainchee nikaalee aur paarsal khola usamen devadaar kee ek dibiya nikalee
jadaoo chandrahaar ek hajaar se neeche achchha nahin mil sakata tha
ramaanaath ne sharamaate hue kaha main is vishay mein kya salaah de sakata hoon magar main itana kah sakata hoon ki is prastaav ko vah khushee se manjoor na karegee
kis jins par kis hisaab se chungee lee jaatee hai isakee chhapee huee taalika maujood thee rama aadha ghante mein apana kaam samajh gaya
lekar khushkhush ghar mein aae aur jaalapa ke haathon mein rakhakar bole tumhaare ghar se aaya hai dekho isamen kya hai
ramesh der kya hogee
baazee shuroo huee
jab tak chhotechhote aadamiyon ka vetan itana na ho jaega ki vah bhalamanasee ke saath nirvaah kar saken tab tak rishvat band na hogee
yah nahin ki sabase peechhe vaale shor machaakar pahale aa jaen aur pahale vaale khade munh taakate rahen
ramaanaath aisa streebhakt nahin hoon
yah haar paakar vah mugdh ho gaee

vah seedhe ramesh baaboo se jaakar bola kya mujhe bhee isee mailee daree par bithaana chaahate hain ek achchheesee mez aur kaee kursiyaan bhijavaie aur chaparaasiyon ko hukm deejie ki ek aadamee se jyaada mere saamane na aane paave
ramaanaath aapane doosaree shaadee kyon nahin kee tab to aapakee umr pachchees se jyaada na rahee hogee
ramaanaath talaash kar raha hoon

vah bhee apanee bahoo ke saath chhihchhih jo kaam seedhe se chal sakata hai usake lie yah phareb kaheen usakee nigaah pad gaee to samajhate ho vah tumhen dil mein kya samajhegee maang lena isase kaheen achchha hai
deenadayaal maare bhookhpyaas ke nirjeevse pade the yah samaachaar sunate hee sachet hokar daude
usase koee poochhata tere bhaee kya hue to vah badee saralata se kahatee badee door khelane gae hain

dayaanaath ne tyoree chadhaakar kaha jo baat jindagee bhar nahin kee vah ab aakhiree vakt nahin kar sakata bahoo se saaphsaaph kah do usase parda rakhane kee jaroorat hee kya hai aur parda rah hee kitane din sakata hai
tumhaare maangane kee jaroorat hee na padegee
raah mein koee bhediya nahin baitha hai jo mujhe utha le jaega aur utha bhee le jae to kya gam
boleebahoo aa jaegee to usakee aankhen bhee khulengee dekh lena
saare daphtar mein rama kee saraahana hone lagee
ramaanaath theek aaj main tumhen phoolon kee devee banaoonga
kaheen logon mein gaaleegalauj ho rahee hai kaheen chaparaasiyon mein hanseedillagee
vah drshti baan ke samaan usake hraday ko chhedane lagee usane socha shaayad mujhe bhamr hua
agar tum chaaho to chhah maheene mein sab roopaye chuka sakate ho
rama ne ek baar daratedarate phir kaha aisee jaldee kya hai daspaanch din mein lauta dena
aap kya sarraaph ko dochaarchhah maheene nahin taal sakate aap dena chaahen to itane dinon mein hajaarbaarah sau roopaye badee aasaanee se de sakate hain
in shabdon mein kitanee apaar marmaantak vedana bharee huee thee isaka anumaan teenon yuvatiyon mein koee bhee na kar sakee
ramesh pahale sab aise hee ghabaraate hain magar sahatesahate aadat pad jaatee hai
ramaanaath main to museebat mein phans gaya
madooo ne gahane banavae the auraton ne pahane the sabhee aalochana karane lage
jaalapa ko ab apana haar achchha na lagata pita se bolee baaboojee mujhe bhee aisa hee haar la deejie
rama ko dekhate hee vah soocheepatr chhipa letee thee
sabhee apaneapane kaam kee jaldee macha rahe hain
yah haar chhah sau mein bana tha
vah girojee rang ka ek chandrahaar tha
tum kushal se rahoge to mujhe bahut gahane mil jaenge
saataven din sarraaph aaya magar yahaan roopaye kahaan the dayaanaath mein lallochappo kee aadat na thee magar aaj unhonne use chakama dene kee khoob koshish kee
use us svapn kee baat bhee yaad aaee jo jaalapa ne choree kee raat ko dekha tha
baakee log apana nambar aane tak baahar rahen
saara kaam bade hee avyavasthit roop se ho raha hai
is ek aane mein aadha chaparaasiyon ka hak hai
bhojan kee taiyaariyaan hone lageen
maata ke hraday par in sahradayata se bhare hue shabdon ne chot kee

aur phir yahee ek santaan hai bachaakar rakhenge to kisake lie dayaanaath ko ab koee baat na soojhee keval yahee kaha vah chaahe laakh de den chaahe ek na den main na kahoonga ki do na kahoonga ki mat do
chaaron taraph badanaamee hogee
jaalapa yah sab kuchh soch chukee hoon aur jyaada nahin sochana chaahatee
usake paas jo baalsampatti thee usamen sabase moolyavaan sabase priy yahee billaur ka haar tha
ramesh baaboo kee aankhon mein nashe keesee laalee chhaane lagee
agar ginatee hee ginaanee thee to itane hee daamon mein isake doone gahane aa jaate

ramesh baaboo se milakar jab vah apane kaam ka chaarj lene aaya to dekha ek baraamade mein phatee huee mailee daree par ek miyaan saahab sandook par rajistar phailae baithe hain aur vyaapaaree log unhen chaaron taraph se ghere khade hain
bisaatee ne apana sandook khola aur chamakateedamakatee cheejen nikaalakar dikhaane laga
bahuen bahut dekheen par aisee bahoo na dekhee thee
unaka bas chalata to shahajaadee ka munh band kar deteen baarbaar use chup rahane ka ishaara kar rahee theen magar jaalapa ko shahajaadee ka yah vyangy sanvedana se paripoorn jaan pada
vah apane saubhaagy par phoola na samaata tha
bole bohanee to achchhee huee tumhaare lie main ek jagah soch raha hoon
dayaanaath ne phir kaha yah jagah to tees roopaye kee thee tumhen bees hee roope mile
ramaanaath sharm aatee hai kisee se kahate hue
sarraaph ko ek hajaar nagad mil gae ek hajaar ke lie ek saptaah ka vaada hua to usane koee aapatti na kee
jaalapa ne premsaras najaron se dekhakar kaha mere daadaajee tumhen dekhakar gae aur ammaajee se tumhaara bakhaan karane lage to main sochatee thee ki tum kaise hoge
use apane oopar itanee ghrna huee ki ek baar jee mein aaya saara kapatvyavahaar khol doon lekin sambhal gaya
aashaadh ka pahala paanee tha ek hee kshan mein vah lathapath ho gaya
ramesh baaboo is nae rang eet kee kaarypatuta par mugdh ho gae
jaalapa ne bistar par se zara khisakakar kaha main bahut jald chalee aaoongee
vetan kul paanch roopaye paate the jo unake tambaakoo ke kharch ko bhee kaaphee na hota tha
baasantee tumhaaree saas badee chatur jaan padatee hain koee cheej nahin chhodee
jaalapa ne bistaraband se bistare ko baandha aur phir apane sandook ko saaph karane lagee
unake gahane unhen mubaarak hon
dayaanaath to phir kisee doosare bahaane se maangana padega
maanakee ne ronee soorat banaakar kaha nahin chandrahaar nahin aaya

vah jaanata tha achchhee aamadanee tabhee ho sakatee hai jab achchha thaath ho sadak ke chaukeedaar ko ek paisa kaaphee samajha jaata hai lekin usakee jagah saarjant ho to kisee kee himmat hee na padegee ki use ek paisa dikhae
maan se bolee amma main yah haar loongee
is haardik kaamana ko prakat karake vah apanee hansee na udavaana chaahatee thee
sajal netr hokar bolee kya karogee poochhakar bahan jo hona tha so ho gaya
vah jameendaar na the par jameendaaree karate the
kaee vyaapaariyon ne kaha haan baaboojee yah intajaam ho jae to bahut achchha ho bhabhbhad mein badee der ho jaatee hai
ramesh poore pachchees ho gae saahab bees baras to stree ka dehaant hue ho gae
ladakiyaan bhee jhool raheen hain aur unakee maataen bhee
bas teenchaar cheejen lauta de to kaam ban jaay
log to dhan dekhate hain isalie usane is avasar par saaree shakti laga dee aur usakee vijay huee
jaageshvaree doge kahaan se kuchh socha hai
vah teesara din bhee aa gaya aur ab dayaanaath ko apanee laaj rakhane ka koee upaay na soojhata tha
is par jaalapa ne kathor najaron se dekhakar kaha jab tak main ise lautaan doongee mere dil ko chain na aaega
jaalapa ne vakrokti ke bhaav se kaha haan deh mein ek aankh ke na hone se kya hota hai aur sab ang hote hee hain aankhen huee to kya na huee to kya
usaka vash chalata to vah chadhaave ko uthaakar aag mein phenk detee
yon baaten karate hue donon aadamee daphtar pahunch gae
jab tak yah prashn hal na ho jaay mere hosh thikaane nahin honge
naam jode gahane se nahin hota daandakshina se hota hai
ramaanaath kuchh bhee nahin
bole ab to sona chaahie
jab tak gale mein jua nahin pada hai tabhee tak yah kulelen hain
gahanon ka prabandh kisee sarraaph se kar lena
kisee ka pamp shoo pahan liya kisee kee ghadee kalaee par baandha lee
tees roopayon mein guzar nahin ho sakatee
chadhaava jyonhee pahuncha ghar mein halachal mach gaee
sakhiyon ne use khoob chidhaaya bechaaree rooaansee ho gaee
kaunsa aabhooshan kitane ka hoga isaka bhee usane anumaan kar liya tha
dayaanaath ne is tarah gardan uthaee maano sir par saikadon man ka bojh lada hua hai
yah avasar vah kyon chhodane laga visheshakar jab bade baaboo usake gahare dost the
usaka saara viraag saaree udaaseenata saaree manovyatha maano chhoomantar ho gaee thee
jab vah mujhe kuchh nahin samajhate to main bhee unhen kuchh nahin samajhatee
haan khoob yaad aaee kyon jallee teree ammaajee ke paas bada achchha chandrahaar hai
vah khud hee denge
jaalapa kee nazaron se phir jaane kee kalpana hee usake lie asahy thee
jaalapa ne ullasit hokar kaha haan jee balki pandrah hee kahana oopar kee aamadanee kee to charcha hee karana vyarth hai
jab itana karane par bhee haaytoba mach gaee to matalab bhee to na poora hua
subahshaam haaziree denee padegee
aur kuchh bolane se baat badh jaane ka bhay tha par rama ko usakee drshti se aisa bhaasit hua maano use choree ka rahasy maaloom hai aur vah keval sankoch ke kaaran use kholakar nahin kah rahee hai
isakee jaroorat hee kya thee jyaadasejyaada log yahee to kahate mahaashay bade krpan hain
ek baar koee rasm toot jaatee hai to usaka bandhana mushkil ho jaata hai
ramaanaath kah doonga ramesh baaboo ne aane nahin diya
jaageshvaree ne paanee laakar rakh diya aur poochha aaj tum dinabhar kahaan rahe lo haathmunh dho daalo
bina kuchh paida kie ab nirvaah nahin hai
jaageshvaree bolee aur kaunsa bahaana kiya jaayaga agar kaha jaay kisee ko manganee dena hai to shaayad vah degee nahin
ramaanaath nae aadamee ko poora vetan kaise dete shaayad saalchhah maheene mein badh jaay
deenadayaal ne khoob diya lekin vahaan se jo kuchh mila vah sab naachtamaashe negachaar mein kharch ho gaya
usakee badee ichchha huee ki zara aaeene mein apanee chhavi dekhe
rama ne daravaaze par jaakar dekha to usake naam ek paarsal aaya tha
jaalapa pati kee or teevr drshti se dekhakar rah gaee
jaalapa ne munh udharakar kaha aisa hee hoga
jaageshvaree bhookh kyon nahin hai raat bhee to kuchh nahin khaaya tha is tarah daanapaanee chhod dene se mahaajan ke roopaye thode hee ada ho jaenge
is vakt daphtar se chala aata hoon
kya yah ghar aisee anany sundaree ke yogy tha jaalapa ke pita paanch roopaye ke naukar the par jaalapa ne kabhee apane ghar mein jhaadoo na lagaee thee
munshee deenadayaal kee jaanpahachaan ke aadamiyon mein ek mahaashay dayaanaath the bade hee sajjan aur sahraday kachaharee mein naukar the aur pachaas roopaye vetan paate the
zara akl kee gaanth to khule
aaj usaka chitt bahut khikai tha
mera yahee upadesh hai ki parae paise ko haraam samajhana
dochaar pench ladaadete
ramaanaath achchha kal kee rahee
jaageshvaree ko apane vivaah kee baat yaad aaee
achchheachchhe dhakke kha rahe hain
main kyon baadhak banoon
aaj hee ke din par to usakee samast aashaen avalambit theen
rama uchhal pada kitana saral upaay tha aur abhee tak yah seedheesee baat use na soojhee thee
kabhee apanee dhotee na chhaantee thee
vah kyon shataranj khelane laga
aabhooshan pahanane se hota hee kya hai
kya kahate
unaka vichaar ek hajaar dene ka tha par ek hajaar teeke hee mein de aae
ek mahila bolee are chandrahaar nahin aaya
jee mein aata hai kaheen bhaag jaoon
usake mitron ne isaka anumodan kiya prastaav sveekrt ho gaya
baajee palat chukee thee
ramaanaath to phir main ghar jaata hoon
yahee usake khilaune the
agar un logon ke hraday hota to kya vahaan jaane se inkaar na kar dete
jab tak dochaar patrpatrikaen na padhalen unhen khaana na hajam hota tha
vah isee krodh mein bharee baithee thee ki usakee teen sakhiyaan aakar khadee ho gaee
bole tum log jaakar kha lo mujhe bhookh nahin hai
ramesh haan vetan to kam hai magar shaayad aage chalakar badh jae
apanee haar ko chhipaane ka unake paas yahee sanket tha
jaalapa main in logon ka rookh samajhatee hoon
usee mahila ne munh banaakar kaha chandrahaar kee baat hee aur hai
vah pachhataata raha tha ki mainne kyon jaalapa se deengen maareen
jaageshvaree ne aakar kaha bhojan kab se bana thanda ho raha hai
use apanee naak mein khushkee aankhon mein jalan aur sir mein chakkar maaloom ho raha tha
gudiyaan aur khilaune vah vyarth samajhate the isalie jaalapa aabhooshanon se hee khelatee thee
naagapanchamee ke din muhalle kee kaee yuvatiyaan jaalapa ke saath kajalee khelane aaeen magar jaalapa apane kamare ke baahar nahin nikalee
anuraag sphoorti ka bhandaar hai
magar vetan bahut kam hai keval tees roopaye
apana bichhaavan na bichhaaya tha
bada ladaka do hee maheene tak kolej mein rahane ke baad padhana chhod baitha
mere lie dedh sau kaaphee hain
ramaanaath jo pahale aave usaka kaam pahale hona chaahie
avasar milata to unake saath khelate the
ekek karake nambaravaar aaven ek kaagaj par sabake naam nambaravaar likh liya karo
par tumane do hee minat mein mere saare manasoobe chaupat kar die
jab un logon ne udaarata dikhaee aur ladaka mujhe saump diya to main bhee dikha dena chaahata hoon ki ham bhee shareeph hain aur sheel ka mooly pahachaanate hain
jaageshvaree bahoo ka haal to sun chuke phir bhee usase aisee aasha rakhate ho usakee tek hai ki jab tak chandrahaar na ban jaayaga koee gahana hee na pahanoongee
shataranj kee badaulat usaka kitane hee achchheachchhe aadamiyon se parichay tha lekin vah sankoch aur dar ke kaaran kisee se apanee sthiti prakat na kar sakata tha
jaageshvaree par in daleelon ka koee asar na hua boleevah bhee to kuchh dega
gareebon ka kaam yon hee kar dena
deenadayaal ne muskaraakar kaha la doonga betee
unakee aay ke aur kaun se maarg the yah kaun jaanata hai
ladake par kaun reejhata hai
maanakee ne chadhaav ko saamane se hataakar kaha bechaaree ke bhaag mein chandrahaar likha hee nahin hai
kisake jeevan mein aise kuavasar nahin aate tumheen apanee maan se poochho
aap sunre hai premchand ka likha upanyas gaban mere yaani kritika ke saath
maaloom hua deh mein rakt kee boond bhee nahin hai
jaalapa ne kuchh uttar na diya
chaparaasiyon ne jhukakar salaam kie
chaahate to hajaaron vasool karate par kabhee ek paise ke bhee ravaadaar nahin hue the
shahajaadee to sookha prem tumheen ko gale
vyaapaaree kee laagat nikal aatee hai to nagad ko tatkaal paane ke lie aagrah nahin karata
koee usase vetan to poochhega nahin mahaajan log usaka thaathbaat dekhakar saham jaenge
yah sab rama ka dussaahas hai
aakaash mein sunaharee ghataen chhaee huee hain
jaalapa khulee huee chhat par letee huee thee
vahaan sabhee is kala ke visheshagy the
jaalapa kya tum chaahate ho ki main yaheen ghutghutakar mar jaoon
use kya javaab diya jaega meree samajh mein to yahee ek upaay hai ki utane roopaye ke gahane use lauta die jaen
jab se choree huee mere dil par jaisee gujaratee hai vah dil hee jaanata hai
rama ne pheele ko phir uthaane kee cheshta karake kaha aap mujhe baaton mein lagaakar mere muhare udaate jaate hain isakee sanad nahin lao mera pheela
zara der ke lie use dukh to jaroor hoga lekin aage ke vaaste raasta saaph ho jaega
bolee nahin yah baat nahin hai jallee aagrah karane se sab kuchh ho sakata hai saassasur ko baarbaar yaad dilaatee rahana
bahut jaldee
jab main naukar hua to tumhaaree hee umr meree bhee thee aur shaadee hue teen hee maheene hue the
yahaan tak ki apanee ke dhotee kee kheench tak na see thee
kaise nikale usane kitane hee upaay soche lekin koee aisa na tha jo aage chalakar use ulajhanon mein na daal deta daladal mein na phansa deta
yah kahate hue usane haar ko usee dibbe mein rakh diya aur us par kapada lapetakar seene lagee
sasuraal se mile hue roopaye kuchh bach rahe the
kisee ne pooriyaan khaee kisee ne upalon par khichadee pakaee
rama idhar doek baar aaya avashy par bisaat par na baitha ramesh baaboo ne muhare bichha die
ladakon kee shiksha ka kharch mushkil se das roopaye tha ramaanaath ne chaalees batalae the
krtrim sahaanubhooti dikhaatee huee bolee sab na jaane kahaan ke jangalee hain ki aur sab cheejen to lae chandrahaar na lae jo sab gahanon ka raaja hai
stree ke najaron mein tuchchh banana kaun chaahata hai
aur sab takaaje to daspaanch din tal bhee sakate the par sarraaph kisee tarah na maanata tha
vaniksamaaj mein aaj hee usake rangdhang kee aalochana aur prashansa hone lagee
mainne chhal kabhee nahin kiya aur na kabhee karoonga
kal lalakaar kar paanch maaten na dee hon to kahiega
raat to apanee hai
munshee deenadayaal un aadamiyon mein se the jo seedhon ke saath seedhe hote hain par tedhon ke saath tedhe hee nahin shaitaan ho jaate hain
baalakon ke munh se gambheer baaten sunakar jaise hamen hansee aa jaatee hai usee tarah jaalapa ke munh se yah laalasa se bharee huee baaten sunakar raadha aur baasantee apanee hansee na rok sakeen
jab tum andar gae the to usee ne tumhen paan ke beede die the yaad hai
kal hee thode laut aaoge
maata ne kahayah to bada mahanga hai
do kolej mein padhate hain
yah bhee jaanata tha ki yah maansammaan usee vakt tak hai jab tak kisee ke samaane madad ke lie haath nahin phailaata
vah daphtar hee mein tha ki aasamaan par baadal ghir aae
bole jagah to achchhee hai
isase jyaada uttejak vah puraana soocheepatr tha jo ek din rama kaheen se utha laaya tha
ghar ka kiraaya paanch roopaya tha ramaanaath ne pandrah batalae the
ramesh buree tarah daantata hai log usake saamane jaate hue kaampate hain
bas vahee ek billauree haar gale mein daale hue hai
jagah aamadanee kee hai
aaj itane dinon ke baad unhen mujh par daya aaee hai
gaanv mein koee utsav hota ya koee tyohaar padata to vah usee haar ko pahanatee
main bhee aadamee hoon
phir roopaye kee bhee to phikr hai
padhana chaahate ho to apane purooshaarth se padho
phir kitana bura maaloom hota hai ki kal kee aaee bahoo usase gahane chheen lie jaen
ladakee ka naam jaalapa tha maata ka maanakee
ramaanaath milanasaar yuvak tha usake mitr hee is samay har ek kaam mein agrasar ho rahe the
vah samajh gae the is vakt chaahe jitanee baaziyaan kheloon jeet meree hee hogee magar jab chauthee baazee haar gae to yah vishvaas jaata raha
baasantee vish kee gaanth to too hai hee
rama ne saavadhan hokar kaha aakhir kuchh maaloom bhee to ho kya baat huee
haan halavaee kee dukaan se aadha ser mithaee bhee lete aana
us bhojan se kya laabh ki pet mein peeda hone lage main to samajh raha tha ki aapane koee maarg nikaal liya hoga
jaalapa jao main tumase na boloongee roj heelehavaale karate ho achchha kal la doge na
rama ne vismit hokar kaha lautaane kee kya jaroorat hai vah naaraaj na hongee
ramesh jagah aamadanee kee hai
ramaanaath ne paan khaaya aur mardaane kamare mein aakar khat likhane baithe
jaageshvaree khoon munh lag gaya kya
rama ne haar le liya aur chaarapaee se uthata hua bola zara amma aur baaboo jee ko to dikha doon
kisee ne koee cheej lee kisee ne koee cheej
dayaanaath bhee to gulachharre udaate the lekin usake aate hee unhen chaar paise kamaane kee phikr kaisee sir par savaar ho gaee thee
unhen jaalapa se gahane maangane mein koee sankoch na hoga aur yahee vah na chaahata tha
koee chalata hua aadamee shaayad itana vyagr na hota heelehavaale karake mahaajan ko maheenon taalata rahata lekin dayaanaath is maamale mein anaadee the
mujhe kya maaloom tha ki aap mere sir yah museebaton kee tokaree patak denge
kisee ko jel jaate dekha tha kisee ko santaan se haath dhote kisee ko durvyasanon ke panje mein phansate
ek hajaar to teemataam ke lie chaahie jode aur gahanon ke lie alag
abhee paarsal taiyaar hua jaata hai haal hee lauta do
kaee maamoolee chaalon ke baad ramesh baaboo ne rama ka rookh peet liya
kachche motiyon ke gahane the kachche lais aur gote rangeen moje khoobasoorat gudiyaan aur gudiyon ke gahane bachchon ke lattoo aur jhunajhune
jaalapa ne unhen dekhate hee aankhen ponchh daaleen aur muskaraane lagee
dayaanaath ne garm hokar kaha tumhen kya tum to ghar mein baithee rahogee
gopee ka terahavaan saal tha vishvambhar ka navaan
is vesh mein pati kee or taakate hue bhee use sankoch hua
dayaanaath kuchh lajjit hokar bole itane par bhee chandrahaar na hone se vahaan haaytoba mach gaee
dayaanaath ne upekshabhaav se kaha khul chuka jise shataranj aur sairsapaate se phurasat na mile use sabhee dvaar band milenge
mujhe sharm aatee hai
mujhe baaton mein lagaakar saare muhare uda lie
ramaanaath koee nahin hote
karj main lena nahin chaahata aur loon to doonga kisake ghar se
ramaanaath ne jhempate hue kaha main maang to nahin sakata kahie utha laoon
usane maata se jaakar kaha ammaajee mujhe bhee apanasa haar banava do
yah aabhooshan laalasa usake lie hansane kee baat nahin rone kee baat thee
deenadayaal ne gambheer bhaav se kaha aur sabhee cheejen to hain ek chandrahaar hee to nahin hai
yah kahatekahate lajja kshobh aur apanee neechata ke gyaan se usakee aankhen sajal ho gaee
maata aur pita ke jeevan mein aur kya avalamb deenadayaal jab kabhee prayaag jaate to jaalapa ke lie koee na koee aabhooshan jaroor laate
pados hee mein ek sethajee rahate the unake yahaan badee dhoomadhaam se utsav manaaya jaata tha
vah karj se koson bhaagate the
unheen phoolon kee bhaanti usaka ekek rom praphullit ho gaya
haan maal utana chokha nahin hai
vah khush tha ki itane dinon ke baad aaj use prasann karane ka mauka to mila
durdaiv ne aaj vah avalamb bhee chheen liya
sookhee kalam ghisane vaale daphtar ke baabuon ko jab sigaret paan chaay ya jalapaan kee ichchha hotee to rama ke paas chale aate us bahatee ganga mein sabhee haath dho sakate the
aisa chadhaava ho ki madave vaale dekhakar bhadak uthen
jaalapa ne munh udhar liya koee uttar na diya
kitanee hee sundariyaan dekheen kaee baar logon ne vivaah ke lie ghera bhee lekin kabhee ichchha hee na huee
ramaanaath ka kaleja masos utha
bina maange kaam nahin chal sakata kal ya to roopaye dene padenge ya gahane lautaane padenge
mainne aaj pakka iraada kar liya tha ki chaahe brahma bhee utar aaen par main na maanoongee
jaageshvaree bete ka byaah kiya hai ki thattha hai shaadeebyaah mein sabhee karz lete hain tumane koee naee baat nahin kee
nahin to aur gahanon ke saath yah bhee chala jaata
dochaar din ke anubhav se hee rama ko saare daanvghaat maaloom ho gae
sir jhukae chapat kee prateeksha kar rahe the par ramaanaath ne chapat nahin lagaee modhe par baithakar gopeenaath se bola tumane bhang kee dukaan dekhee hai na nukkad par
vah kuchhkuchh niraash ho chalee thee
to chalo phir khaana kha len
aap ameer aadamee hain magar rasm na bigaadiega

jis saral baalika par use apane praanon ko nyochhaavar karana chaahie tha usee ka sarvasv apaharan karane par vah tula hua hai vah itana vyagr hua ki jee mein aaya kothe se koodakar praanon ka ant kar de
dvaarachaar ke samay usakee sakhiyaan use chhat par kheench le gaee aur usane ramaanaath ko dekha
lekin sasuraal se na aae to usake saamane teen ladakiyon ke vivaah ho chuke the kisee kee sasuraal se chandrahaar na aaya tha
ramaanaath kyon paanch baajiyaan pooree na kar leejie
dayaanaath khud ladakon ko kabhee na maarate the
haan jo kuchh mujhase kaha gaya vah mainne kiya
rama ko dekhate hee ladakon ne taash ko taat ke neeche chhipa diya aur padhane lage
sarraaph ka takaaja hai
kyon nahin usase doteen gahane maang lete tum chaaho to le sakate ho hamaare lie mushkil hai
varsha band ho chukee thee keval chhat par rooka hua paanee tapak raha tha
isamen bhaanti bhaanti ke sundar aabhooshanon ke namoone bane hue the
gahane lauta dene mein bhee vah jhanjhat karega lekin dasbees roopaye ke lobh mein lautaane par raajee ho jaayaga
prem se yadi vah mujhe ek chhalla bhee de den to main donon haathon se le loon
jaalapa unheen kee ladakee thee
ramaanaath ne teevr kanth se kaha aur aap kya samajh rahe hain
akhabaar kahaan tak padhate
tumhaara dil dhadak raha hoga ki na jaane kaisee beetegee
haan to tumhen vah jagah manjoor hai
kisee ka chestar maang liya aur shaam ko hava khaane nikal gae
degee bhee to dochaar din mein lautaenge kaise
dayaanaath tum javaan aadamee ho kaam se na ghabadaana chaahie
ramaanaath aapako isase kya matalab
jaalapa mujhe to kisee kee parava nahin hai jee hamaare ghar kis baat kee kamee hai daalrotee vahaan bhee mil jaayagee
tumase baaten karane kee usakee badee ichchha thee
jaalapa main un bahoobetiyon mein nahin hoon
amma aur baaboojee se ek baar nahin laakhon baar kaha zor dekar kaha ki dochaar cheezen to banava hee deejie par kisee ke kaan par joon tak na rengee
abhee teesara pahar hai par aisa maaloom hon raha hai shaam ho gayee
maano murajhae hue man ko bhee hara kar detee hain
koee kajalee gaane lagatee hai koee baarahamaasa
khaan saahab usakee is namrata se prasann ho gae
bahuton ne kiya hai tum bhee kar sakate ho
phir ek ko tees roopaye aur doosare ko teen sau roope kyon dete ho rama ka pharjee pit gaya ramesh baaboo ne bade zor se kahakaha maara
kahate hain mukhtaar saahab ne ek gareeb aadamee ko itana pitavaaya tha ki vah mar gaya tha
naukaree mil jaane ka shubh samaachaar sunaane ka aanand is daungade kee kya paravaah kar sakata tha vetan to keval tees hee roopaye the par jagah aamadanee kee thee
jaageshvaree ne is baadha ko maano hava mein udaakar kaha mujhe to vishvaas hai ki vah teeke mein ek hajaar se kam na denge
phir bhee vah kaheen rooka nahin
muskaraakar bole har ek biltee par ek aana bandha hua hai khulee huee baat hai
yahaan nahin rahana chaahatee
mujhe to arzee lekar jaate hee sharm aatee hai
naatak us vakt paas hota hai jab rasik samaaj use pansad kar leta hai
daspaanch kee cheez to hai nahin ki jab chaaha banava liya saikadon ka kharch hai phir kaareegar to hamesha achchhe nahin milate
